{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3309227,"name":"Nilesh Agarwalla","username":"BrownGenius","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/browngenius/{size}/200224_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-14T14:27:30.554Z","cooked":"

Hi Everyone,

The DevilBotz 2876 would like to share the CAD for our ArduCam B0332 GoPro Mount Compatible Case.

Feel free to copy, modify, remix, etc! Please share any suggestions/improvements in the comments.

  • CAD
  • STL v8|attachment (146.3 KB)

ArduCam Mount Assembly v6 - Front816×1023 161 KB

ArduCam Mount Assembly v6 - Back819×983 127 KB

ArduCam Mount Assembly v6 - Exploded1915×959 331 KB

To assemble the case, you will need:

  • 1x ArduCam B0332 Camera + USB Cable
  • 1x ArduCam Case (Front and Back)
  • 4x M2.5 x 0.45mm hex nuts
  • 4x M2.5 x 0.45mm 25 mm screws

Note: This design was inspired by NRG Team 948’s ArduCam Case
